content:
To normalize the provided profile data according to the specified guidelines, I'll follow the normalization instructions for each relevant field. Let's process the input profile:

### Input Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Sr. Software Eng",
  "location": "SF, California",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React.js",
    "Proj. Mgmt"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc",
      "title": "Lead Software Eng",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "March 2018",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Jr. Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "June 2015",
        "end_date": "February 2018",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, CA"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Normalized Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
  "location": "San Francisco, California, United States",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React",
    "Project Management"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc.",
      "title": "Lead Software Engineer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2018-03",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Junior Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2015-06",
        "end_date": "2018-02",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    }
  ],
  "normalization_notes": "Expanded SF to full city name; Standardized job titles and skill names; Added punctuation to company name."
}
```

### Explanation of Changes
- **Title**: "Sr. Software Eng" was expanded to "Senior Software Engineer".
- **Location**: "SF, California" was expanded to "San Francisco, California, United States".
- **Key Skills**: "React.js" was simplified to "React", and "Proj. Mgmt" was expanded to "Project Management".
- **Experience**:
  - **Company Names**: "Tech Solutions Inc" was updated to "Tech Solutions Inc." to standardize punctuation.
  - **Job Titles**: "Lead Software Eng" was expanded to "Lead Software Engineer", and "Jr. Developer" was expanded to "Junior Developer".
  - **Locations**: "San Francisco" and "San Francisco, CA" were expanded to "San Francisco, California, United States".
  - **Dates**: Converted to ISO format (e.g., "March 2018" to "2018-03").

These changes ensure consistency and clarity across the profile data, making it more suitable for analysis and clustering.
